Reference

Package

tabr

tabr: Guitar tablature and sheet music engraving.

Create tablature

Functions for writing and rendering LilyPond files.

tab()

Create tablature

lilypond()

Save score to LilyPond file

tabr_options()

Options

Organizing music

Functions for hierarchical music notation organization.

phrase() p()

Create a musical phrase

track()

Create a music track

trackbind()

Bind track tables

score()

Create a music score

Phrase helpers

Functions for describing, assembling and connecting musical phrases.

glue() dup()

Append and duplicate

rest()

Create rests

tie()

Tied notes

notate()

Add text to music staff

hp()

Hammer ons and pull offs

tuplet() triplet()

Tuplets

transpose() tp()

Transpose pitch

Repeats

Functions to assist with repeated sections of music.

rp() pct() volta()

Repeat phrases

Chords

Functions for chord description.

chord_set()

Generate a chord set

Key signsture helpers

Functions providing key information and specification

keys() is_natural() is_sharp() is_flat() n_sharps() n_flats() is_major() is_minor()

Key signatures

MIDI conversion

Functions for converting MIDI files with LilyPond

midily()

Convert MIDI to LilyPond file

miditab()

Convert MIDI to tablature

Other functions

%>%

Pipe

Datasets

tabrSyntax

tabr syntax.

tunings

Predefined instrument tunings.
